mapper.select: SELECT P.id as post_id, P.title as title, P.content as content, P.views as views, P.created_at as created_at, P.updated_at as updated_at, M.id as author_id, M.username as author_username FROM posts P LEFT OUTER JOIN members M ON P.member_id = M.id where P.id= #{id}

SELECT P.id as post_id, P.title as title, P.content as content, P.views as views, P.created_at as created_at, P.updated_at as updated_at, M.id as author_id, M.username as author_username, FROM posts P LEFT OUTER JOIN members M ON P.member_id = M.id

SELECT C.id as comment_id, C.post_id as post_id, C.content as content, C.created_at as created_at, C.updated_at as updated_at, M.id as author_id, M.username as author_username FROM comments C LEFT OUTER JOIN members M ON C.member_id = M.id WHERE C.post_id = #{postId}
